title: mrnet can't detect version error
body:
When I try to build mrnet with these commands I get the error message that spack can't detect the version of mrnet in https://github.com/dyninst/mrnet.git.
There seems to be a problem with the mrnet package.py file with regards to finding the source code to use for the build.

[jeg@localhost packages]$ spack install mrnet
==> Installing mrnet
==> boost is already installed in /home/jeg/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora19-x86_64/gcc-4.8.3/boost-1.61.0-wngezegu6antkdja4gjfuo3h3xec5qpi
==> Error: Couldn't detect version in: https://github.com/dyninst/mrnet.git
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code : 256
[jeg@localhost packages]$ 

spack install mrnet@5.0.1-2
==> Installing mrnet
==> boost is already installed in /home/jeg/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora19-x86_64/gcc-4.8.3/boost-1.61.0-wngezegu6antkdja4gjfuo3h3xec5qpi
==> Error: Couldn't detect version in: https://github.com/dyninst/mrnet.git
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code : 256
[jeg@localhost packages]$ 

[jeg@localhost packages]$ spack install mrnet@5.0.1:
==> Installing mrnet
==> boost is already installed in /home/jeg/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora19-x86_64/gcc-4.8.3/boost-1.61.0-wngezegu6antkdja4gjfuo3h3xec5qpi
==> Error: Couldn't detect version in: https://github.com/dyninst/mrnet.git
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code : 256
[jeg@localhost packages]$ spack install mrnet@5.0.1-2:
==> Installing mrnet
==> boost is already installed in /home/jeg/spack/opt/spack/linux-fedora19-x86_64/gcc-4.8.3/boost-1.61.0-wngezegu6antkdja4gjfuo3h3xec5qpi
==> Error: Couldn't detect version in: https://github.com/dyninst/mrnet.git
==> Error: Installation process had nonzero exit code : 256

If I comment out this line, then spack will build the 5.0.1 version by default (spack install mrnet)
version('5.0.1-2', git='https://github.com/dyninst/mrnet.git', commit='20b1eacfc6d680d9f6472146d2dfaa0f900cc2e9')

spack install mrnet@5.0.1 does work though.
